item.title: VSCode Customization
item.description:
Extention

Programming

  • Python: IntelliSense (Pylance), Linting, Debugging (multi-threaded, remote), Jupyter Notebooks, code formatting, refactoring, unit tests, and more.

Writing

  • Markdown All in One: All you need for Markdown (keyboard shortcuts, table of contents, auto preview and more).
  • markdownlint: Markdown/CommonMark linting and style checking for Visual Studio Code
